snippet: The District of Columbia’s commissioner, William P. White, had posted a statement disagreeing with President Obama’s reversal on canceling insurance policies.
abstract: William P White, insurance commissioner for the District of Columbia, is dismissed from his job after he publicly questions a decision by Pres Obama to reverse a provision of the Affordable Care Act.

byline.original: By SUSANNE CRAIG and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

lead_paragraph: The District of Columbia’s commissioner, William P. White, had posted a statement disagreeing with President Obama’s reversal on canceling insurance policies.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
